```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, results='hide'}
require(readxl)
library(readxl)

require(fontawesome)
library(fontawesome)

```

```{r echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, results='hide'}
add_lab_link <- function(link_location) {
  ifelse(is.na(link_location), 
        NA, 
        paste0("<a href=\"", "labs/", link_location, "\">",
                '<i class="fa fa-terminal fa-fw"></i>',"</a>"))
}

add_reading_link <- function(link_location) {
  ifelse(is.na(link_location), 
        NA, 
        paste0("<a href=\"", "reading/", link_location, "\">",
               '<i class="fa fa-book fa-fw"></i>', "</a>"))
}

add_hw_link <- function(link_location) {
  ifelse(is.na(link_location), 
        NA, 
        paste0("<a href=\"", "hw/", link_location, "\">",
               '<i class="fa fa-pen-to-square fa-fw"></i>', "</a>"))
}

add_slide_link <- function(link_location) {
  ifelse(is.na(link_location), 
        NA, 
        paste0("<a href=\"", "slides/", link_location, "\">",
               '<i class="fa fa-file-pdf fa-fw"></i>', "</a>"))
}
```

```{r, echo=FALSE, message=FALSE, results='hide'}

schedule = read_xlsx("schedule.xlsx")
schedule[ ,"Labs", drop=FALSE] = add_lab_link(schedule$Labs)
schedule[ ,"Reading", drop=FALSE] = add_reading_link(schedule$Reading)
schedule[ ,"HW", drop=FALSE] = add_hw_link(schedule$HW)
schedule[ ,"Slides", drop=FALSE] = add_slide_link(schedule$Slides)

```



```{r schedule, echo=FALSE,}
options(knitr.kable.NA = '')
knitr::kable(schedule)

```
